channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

On the road next to Granna Wood. About 20 yards North of the road junction.

item.title: Pothole in area called laybe at the bottom of 39 Green Street, 30th January
item.description:
Outside number 39 Green Street, it is considered a layby which is why there is a pothole. Trip hazard to pedestrians
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two/three potholes in same place which have been repaired previously., 30th January
item.description:
A435 towards Cheltenham, left hand turn toward Bishops Cleeve. Small side road leading into Bishops Cleeve. The whole width of the road is made up of a few potholes. Unable to avoid the potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, mid carriageway heading toward PEW, 30th January

item.title: Lots of potholes, 30th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive potholes that aren't getting fixed properly, 30th January
item.description:
Pot holes being patched on manor lane past the farm are all falling apart, this issue has been present for the last 5 years we've been here and constantly has to be reported because they fill in half of them at a time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
